welcome.title: Welcome to BabaGPT
welcome.description: Your intelligent AI companion for effortless conversations and analyses. Experience secure and anonymous interactions with advanced AI technology.

register.title: Register
register.switchToLogin: Already have an account? Log in
register.info: Create your account by selecting 3 animals in order. Remember this sequence - it’s your unique security pattern.

login.title: Login
login.info: Enter your token and select your 3 animals in the same order you chose during registration.

auth.selectAnimalsInOrder: You must select 3 animals and remember their order as your password
auth.orderMatters: Remember: The order of animal selection matters!

login.accountLocked: Account is locked. Please try again after {minutes} minutes.
login.tooManyAttempts: Too many failed attempts. Please try again later.

descriptions.babagpt: Mixtral provides technical and data analyses in a friendly and accessible manner with clear number formatting and engaging presentation.
descriptions.claude: Claude excels at providing clear and concise analytical insights, ideal for data-driven decision-making and precise explanations.
descriptions.o1Preview: o1-Preview is designed to generate comprehensive and accurate responses, suitable for in-depth analysis and lengthy conversations.
descriptions.o1Mini: o1-Mini offers quick and efficient responses, ideal for short queries and fast interactions.
descriptions.chatgpt4: 4o is an analytical assistant capable of adjusting creativity and response length, suitable for customized and precise conversations.
descriptions.x: X is an advanced analytical assistant designed for general AI interactions.
descriptions.gemini: Gemini is a versatile AI assistant that combines natural language understanding with visual capabilities.
descriptions.perplexity: Perplexity is an AI-powered search engine that provides real-time search with concise and accurate responses and engaging presentation.
